column4: after i run lilo from mandriva, i can boot into windows; after i run lilo from ubuntu (same /etc/lilo.conf file, adapted), i can't boot into windows. why?
after i run lilo from mandriva, i can boot into windows; after i run lilo from ubuntu (same /etc/lilo.conf file, adapted), i can't boot into windows. why?
could somebody please paste for me the contents of a /etc/lilo.conf which allows access to a windows xp partition?
grub is doing you a favor ;)
